title: Nettle

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may urticate a player at night except Night 1, stinging anyone that visits them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Stings take one day to take effect.
- Stings can be removed by protections that grant Powerful defense.
- You may not urticate the same player twice.
- You may urticate three times.
- You cannot be roleblocked or controlled.

fields.name: Notifications:
fields.value:
"You have decided to urticate (player)."
"You stung someone who visited your target!"

"You were stung by a Nettle! You will die tomorrow unless you are protected!"
"You were cured from your sting injury!"
"The stinging was too much to handle!"
"They were stung by a Nettle."

desc:
Post 156
*You are a juvenile of strife that injures anyone they see as a threat.*
